"Martha": "Doesn't the Rest Corner have a great atmosphere? We always come here to unwind."
"You've been the talk of the town lately. You must be pretty amazing if the word has spread this far."
"Fighting's all well and good, but you gotta have your own \"look\" to go with it, don't you think?"
"Have to been to the Salon? If not, I'll introduce you!"
"The Salon is where you can have fun customizing your looks."
"Why don't you pay a visit? I'm sure you won't regret it!"
"Have it your way, I guess! Another time, then."
"Well, all that's left is to have fun! If you ever give yourself a new look, come show it off to us!"
"We're about to head to the salon ourselves in a little while!"
